com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.checksettings

Interface CheckSettings

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CheckSettingsImpl, NullCheckSettings

    public interface CheckSettings
    Use the CheckSettings to define which checks the server should perform. This class is read-only. Use the CheckSettingsBuilder to create an instance of CheckSettings.

        boolean isSEOCheckActive()
        Returns:
        true, if search engine optimization is active

      • getTermSets

        Set<TermSet> getTermSets()
        Returns:
        the name of the term sets that should be used for the check

      • getTermStatus

        Set<TermStatus> getTermStatus()
        Returns:
        termStatus Terms with this status should be flagged. You usually check for deprecated and admitted terms (see TermStatus).

      • getReportLanguage

        Language getReportLanguage()
        Gets the report language. The checking report generated by the Acrolinx Server will be localized in this language. If no language is set, the default is English.
